title: Ebert & Roeper - 03.30.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  March 30th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0478087/]21[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0488988/]Chapter 27[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0780516/]Flawless[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0489281/]Stop-Loss[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0425413/]Run Fatboy Run[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0379865/]Leatherheads[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0410377/]Nim&#039;s Island[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0478087/]21[/url]  -  (skip this one unfortunately) down - (good stuff) up
-- Kevin Spacey - Jim Sturgess - Kate Bosworth - Laurence Fishburne

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0488988/]Chapter 27[/url]  -  (interesting picture) up - (respectful interpretation) up
-- Jared Leto - Lindsay Lohan

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0780516/]Flawless[/url]  -  (entertaining second-tier) up - up
-- Michael Caine - Demi Moore

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0489281/]Stop-Loss[/url]  -  down - up
-- co-written & directed by Kimberly Peirce - (Boys Don&#039;t Cry)
-- Ryan Phillippe - Channing Tatum - Joseph Gordon-Levitt

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0425413/]Run Fatboy Run[/url]  -  (not quite) down - (mild) up
-- Simon Pegg - Thandie Newton - Hank Azaria - Dylan Moran

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0408236/]Sweeney Todd[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Sweeney-Todd-Two-Disc-Special-Collectors/dp/B0013D8LOU/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1207009027&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0484111/]The Good Night[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Good-Night-Danny-DeVito/dp/B0012GVMFI/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1207008916&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0952640/]Alvin and the Chipmunks[/url]  -  down - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0416185/]Resurrecting the Champ[/url]  -  down - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0439876/]What Love Is[/url]  -  huge thumbs down - big thumbs down

	---Roeper&#039;s Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0478087/]21[/url]
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0453548/]Snow Angels[/url]
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0780536/]In Bruges[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/ ]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
